ygData.subject: Re: re to latest stuffs :)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Countess Bathory  To:  Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 3:00 PM Subject: [shadowknight] Re: re to
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Countess Bathory <countess_bathory_69@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 3:00 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] Re: re to latest stuffs :)


> From: Countess Bathory <countess_bathory_69@...>
>
> I do believe that Shadow Knight is great class with (in my opinion) a
> few glitches.
>
> On one point that Steven brought up, though, i must burst his bubble
> some.
>
> At this point in time your wife's SK will NOT get a lifetap spell.
> The only spell available to us as a lifetap was Vampiric Embrace but
> this isnt the case. Many have tried this spell in everyway imaginable
> and no HP is transferred from the target to the caster. All it seems to
> do is raise your attack for about 20 seconds.
> **************
Vampiric touch sucks, got burnt on it myself, but you will get a lifetap
*****************
> And as far as bashing and slamming. Thats Troll and Ogre specific.
> Human, Gnome, Dark Elf and Euridite SKs never get slam and need a
> shield to bash. But i personally dont see this as a problem.
> *********
yup
*********
> And anybody who can wield a halberd will do 24 dmg. Thats not SK only.
> **********
and?
*******
> The only things i feel could be improved is the Harm Touch should not
> be resisted and at level 15, start getting HP drain spells that
> actually work.
> And at level 30 we can use Voice Graft. YEEEHAAAA!!! I can see myself
> spending a couple plat on that one. This should definitely be replaced
> with Gate or something worthwhile.
> And Endure Cold and later Resist Cold dont make as much sense as having
> a universal shield spells.
> **************
ermm, sounds like you should try the necro...8)
***********
I still think SK are not underpowered at all, and are one of the best
classes in the game
lifedrain for a warrior at level 15?..ermmm, guess that would make me and my
wife no longer need that shaman,,,guess the healing classes would be
underpowered if the warrior classes start healing themselves..
>
ever played a mud where there where multiclass players? you know, where one
guy could tank, heal and nuke? Well, theyre not too fun, and i think
grouping is where its at,
all classes on eq got there quirks, for sure, but i think the sk are tuff,
and i think my necro is tuff...
I am level 15, and she is level 13...and i wouldnt have her play any other
class....if i thought there was a better combo, id change now....
She did get level 13 in 9 days, level 7 in one nite...bout a 14 hour nite
though...
my response was to the guy that gave up the class, saying SK are not that
good...
I have yet to hear or see anything to make me agree with him in the
slightest..
Morgul
> upgraded, i obviously wouldnt complain.
>
> The comment was made by someone a while ago that these changes would
> make the game easy. I fail to see this. I too dont want an easy
> cakewalk of a game. But i would like my character to have equal skills
> to other classes.
>
>
> Bathory
> Cazic-Thule
>
